segment.documentation: BGM, A segment for unique identification of the Authorization message, its type and number and its function, i.e., specifying if it is an authorization or request for authorization.
DTM, A segment containing the creation date of the Authorization Message.
BUS, A segment providing information for routing of the message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the message to be authorized and possibly the request for an authorization which has been previously sent.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment referring to the message that has to be authorized or to a previously-sent request for authorization.
DTM, A segment indicating the date and time of creation of the message referenced in the RFF segment or possibly the payment date.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the financial institutions involved in the Authorization message.

segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying the Ordered Bank acting for the Ordering Customer and/or Payor and the relevant account number and currency.
CTA, A segment identifying a person or department for the financial institution specified in the FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment providing communication numbers for the financial institution identified in the FII segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments identifying the parties involved in the exchange of the message.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the name and address of the non- financial parties involved in the exchange of this message. (Sender and Recipient).
CTA, A segment identifying a person or department for the party specified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment providing communication numbers for the party identified in the NAD segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments identifying a message or a group of transactions in a message or a specific transaction in a multiple message.

segment.documentation: LIN, A segment specifying the beginning of details referring to the message/transaction to be authorized.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A groups of segments specifying reference numbers, dates and/or times needed to identify a referenced message or transaction.

segment.documentation: RFF, A segment indicating reference number(s) for the message or transaction to be authorized.
DTM, A segment specifying the date/time of the referenced message or transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments identifying the authorization of the message/transaction.

segment.documentation: SEQ, A segment identifying the beginning of the details needed to give the authorization.
GEI, A segment specifying the kind of authorization given to the referenced message/transaction in a coded form.
DTM, A segment identifying dates related to the referenced message/transaction.
MOA, A segment giving the amount of the referenced message/transaction.
DOC, A segment identifying referenced numbers of the referenced message/transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments identifying the financial institutions associated with the referenced message/transaction.

segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying a financial institution related to the referenced message/transaction.
CTA, A segment identifying a person or department for the party specified in the FII segment and to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment providing communication numbers for the party identified in the FII segment and optionally for the contact identified in the associated CTA segment.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments identifying the name and address of non- financial parties associated with the referenced message/transaction.

segment.documentation: NAD, A segment identifying a non-financial party related to the referenced message/transaction.
CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party identified in the NAD segment and to whom communication should be directed.
COM, A segment identifying communications types and numbers for the persons or departments specified in the associated CTA segment.
CNT, A segment identifying the type of control checks and totals.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A segment group identifying the authentication procedures used.

segment.documentation: AUT, A segment specifying the details of any authentication (validation) procedure applied to the Authorisation message.
DTM, A segment defining the validation date/time.
